Dear Parents/Guardians,

items.title: Back to School Night Tonight - Important Reminders
items.description:
Back to School Night is tonight, September 5th from 6-7:30pm. As a reminder, this event is for adults only.

There are two identical sessions:

  • 6:45 - 7:15 pm - K - 6 (Session 2)
